text: My daughter died. Itâ€™ll be twenty-eight years this month. The thirtieth of this month, yeah. She died at Methodist Hospital. She had an operation for appendicitis. It was late Saturday afternoon when they operated, very late.
keypoint: Owen sits by the fire, lost in uneasy thoughts

text: Sunday morning, my oldest daughter, Victoria, went to the hospital to see how she was. She was still under ether. Back then, they used a lot of ether. There was a chair there. They were just starting to get people out of bed, you know.
keypoint: He reacts to a sound, but it's only a deer
